Posts.Content: Oct 26, 2011 01:36AM positivethoughts wrote: I spoke with the Breast Care center this morning and they want me to have an ultrasound on my right breast tomorrow morning. I asked the Radiologist yesterday if they could do a bilateral yesterday and she said no, although I now find out it was in the order for her to do it. I also found out that they have been seeing a cluster of cyst which they are calling complicated. I'm confused by this term however the nurse told me after my ultrasound, and the mammogram (Nov 11) I need to come in and see the Breast Dr, they will then have all the result. I asked about the pain I have been having going on 3 weeks now, she said just take Advil. I am not happy with the answers I am getting. I have not been able to exercise, take my Zumba class and I am wearing a sports bra 24/7 because they feel heavy as hell and swollen, almost to having to tip toe. If I keep having pain by Nov 11th, I will not do the mammogram, that is just too much pain. I also asked her, if I have to come back every 6mos because of this cluster of cyst, why not just take them out, so I wont have the risk of the pain I am going thru now? Okay, sorry, Im just confused, maybe im exaggerating....
